review: Roku is much easier to use and navigate.
author: Kim Roper

review: Apple TV or as I like to call it "Apple Dee App" is a nice little box that plays all sorts of media. It's fun, efficient, and small. It now has HBO Now so you don't have to borrow a friend's anymore. Don't lose the remote.
author: WKG

review: The picture quality is terrible.  My Roku 3, Roku 1, and PS4 all have far better picture quality than my apple tv.  I only purchased this so that I could get HBO Now and watch Game of Thrones, but as soon as they release an app for my other devices, I will get rid of this.
author: Jason

review: I love Apple products, so purchasing the Apple TV was one of the best purchases I've made. You can watch TV shows, music videos, and even create playlists. I highly recommend the Apple TV!
author: Sarah A. Stradling

review: Apple know its thing.... Great product, works amazing with an iPad with AirPlay
